wanikaninotify_description.message: Notifies you when you have more to study on WaniKani!

reviews_available_now.description: Button text when there are reviews available. Appended to 'lessons_available_now' if both are available.

lessons_available_now.description: Button text when there are lessons to learn. Appended to 'reviews_available_now' if both are available.

wait_for_update.message: Waiting to know when is the next review...
wait_for_update.description: Button text after completing reviews and before updating the date for the next review.

reviews_notification.message: You have new reviews on WaniKani!
reviews_notification.description: The text inside the notification bubble.

reviews_available.description: Button in popup label when reviews are available.

lessons_available.description: Button in popup label when lessons are available.

enter_api_key.message: Click here to enter your API Key.
enter_api_key.description: Tooltip in button if API Key is not configured.

openhome.description: Label of Menu button to open WaniKani homepage.

startReview.description: Label of Menu button to open a WaniKani Review Session.

startLesson.description: Label of Menu button to open a WaniKani Lesson Session.

refreshInformation.description: Label of Menu button to refresh WaniKani Notifier's information.

openOptions.description: Label of Menu button to open WaniKani Notifier's Options.
